name: KnightMan
description:
KnightMan is a 2d pixel art action platformer with retro style graphics.



Play as KnightMan. Fight and jump your way through 20 levels across 5 unique zones, each populated with different enemies and traps. Defeat bosses, save maidens and collect coins to purchase weapons, powers and trinkets to help you along your journey to defeat the corrupted Elven Lord.



- Traverse a variety of hand crafted levels.

- 5 unique Zones each with their own aesthetic and enemy types.

- Find Fire, Ice and Lightening powerups in each level that grant KnightMan different attacks,

- Purchase powerful upgrades, weapons and trinkets.

- Fight powerful bosses.

- Save beautiful maidens who will reward you handsomely.

KNIGHTMAN!
